Class Reports

java.lang.Object
Controller.Reports
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Reports extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class creates the Reports controller.
Author:
Mehdi Rahimi

  • Method Details

    • onActionCountryCombo

      void onActionCountryCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      When the user selects a country from the countryCombo, the function gets the countryId of the selected country and passes it to the countCustomers() function in the CustomerDaoImpl class. The countCustomers() function returns the number of customers in the selected country and the function sets the customersTotalLabel to the number of customers
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query is invalid.

    • onActionTypeCombo

      void onActionTypeCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      If the user selects a month and a type, then the function will call the validateSelection function
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query is invalid.

    • onActionMonthCombo

      void onActionMonthCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      If the user selects a month from the monthCombo, then the function will validate the selection
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query is invalid.

    • validateSelection

      private void validateSelection(AppointmentType selectedType, String selectedMonth) throws SQLException
      Validates the selected appointment type and month. If either is null, an error alert is displayed and the method returns without running the countMonthType method. Otherwise, it counts the number of appointments of the selected type in the selected month, and sets the appointmentsTotalLabel to display the count.
      Parameters:
      selectedType - The selected appointment type.
      selectedMonth - The selected month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while querying the database.

    • onActionContactCombo

      void onActionContactCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is the method to display the appointments for the selected contact when the user selects a contact from the contactCombo combo box.
      Parameters:
      event - the user selects a contact from the contactCombo combo box
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query is invalid.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the method to set the combo boxes and set the AppointmentTable from the Appointments table in the database.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query is invalid.
